original_text:
With great force my garment is disfigured;
    it binds me about like the collar of my tunic.
korean_text: 그가 큰 능력으로 나의 옷을 떨쳐 버리시며 나의 옷깃처럼 나를 휘어잡으시는구나

sentences.original_text: With great force my garment is disfigured
it binds me about like the collar of my tunic.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 내 겉옷의 깃처럼 나를 옭아맨다
